article_title: Adam Scott Resurrects 'Step Brothers' Character For Affordable Care Act Video
article_text: Will Ferrell, John C. Reilly and Adam McKay may never get around to that "Step Brothers" sequel everyone wants, but this might be the next best thing. In the most random bit of support for the Affordable Care Act yet, Adam Scott has resurrected his "Step Brothers" character, Derek Huff, for a Funny or Die video about the importance of health care coverage.

Will Ferrell, John C. Reilly and Adam McKay may never get around to that "Step Brothers" sequel everyone wants, but this might be the next best thing.
